charicedecoratie.description: Developing an app to automate Charicedecoratie's entire business process—from package booking (date/time conflict check, package-type dynamic forms), payment with transfer receipt and automatic cancel when deadline exceeded, to rescheduling with rules (only valid if paid and 2+ days in advance). On the operational front, admins get reminders for events, are able to assign freelancers/PICs, perform monthly stock counts, record outbound notes, and monitor auto depreciation of assets by useful life. There's a statistics dashboard: favorite package charts, monthly/yearly income & expense views, and change history for audit purposes. Google Place integration facilitates easy entry of event locations.

msglow.highlight: Flutter analytics app with dashboards, leaderboards, and geolocation.

ayugold.highlight: Custom after-quote logic, BPMN flow design support, and forgot-password redirect fix using Magento 2.

nickscali.highlight: Furniture e‑commerce storefront with PLP/PDP flows and GraphQL integrations; release-ready features and smoother deployments.

alwayshappi.highlight: Shopware storefront improvements, Excel import to DB, custom footer, and N8N integration.

biofarma.highlight: Secure GraphQL + storefront/admin features; faster APIs and smoother ops.

sakafarma.highlight: Pharmacy e-commerce storefront with searchable catalog, product detail, and order flows; admin tools for safer releases.

sinarmasapp.highlight: XML export and GraphQL additions for production date, reviews/ratings, form labels, and spec forms.

hotel-at-home.highlight: Storefront modules and admin tools for a home‑hotel retail experience; improved product discovery and streamlined checkout.

samsonite.highlight: Laravel-based Excel import for products & prices with detailed import history logs.

lnj-logistic.highlight: Warehouse & logistics web app—tracks inbound/outbound, inventory, and delivery documents with role-based controls.

natours.highlight: Travel/tour booking app with map-based tour views, secure auth, Stripe checkout, and user reviews.

airquality-meteorology.highlight: Predicted target PM2.5 and PM10 with NO₂/SO₂/O₃/CO from weather features using Linear Regression/Gradient Boosting Regressor/Random Forest Regressor with cross-validation; best model reached MAE≈0.010 and MSE≈0.082 (scaled).

air-quality-meteorology.description: Explored pollutant–weather correlations using heatmaps and distributions; performed preprocessing using imputation, scaling, and one-hot encoding. Trained Linear Regression, SVR, Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, and LightGBM using GridSearchCV and cross-validation. Evaluated using R²/MAE/MSE/RMSE and checked over/underfitting using train vs. validation errors comparison; visualized results in clean tables/plots.
